Please see if this is still a problem

This doesn't happen anymore.

Regardless, we'll be improving our handling of debug target termination as part
of Bug 13418.

Extremely hard to reproduce - a target is terminated when the workspace shuts 
down. The shutdown has to happen after the evaluation is complete, and before 
the action has a chace to post the result. I'm going to re-open and defer, as I 
think it is still possible to happen.

Fixed plug-in loading problem. We can now get an NPE in JDI code (null reply 
packet) when the current method invocation of the evaluation completes, but 
that is a dup of bug# 21622.

Fixed in LocalEvaluationEngine, EvaluationThread, and EvaluateAction.
